name: Nothing (Bocodillo)
description:
A game made for LDJAM45 "Start with Nothing".

It is a game though honest, it's not just a blank screen. Press keys (but not the SPACEBAR because that's a button for dirty cheaters) and click around until something happens, I know you can work it out!

The project was made in 48 hours using Unity, Ableton, Aseprite & Bfxr.
